name: Strata (itch) (Dreyan)
description:
Descend through the Strata, becoming more powerful as you go to fight back against the ever-threatening statue beasts.

WASD to move

LMB to fire

RMB to swing axe

SPACE to dash

You can play in browser but there are some shader issues, we recommend downloading for the best experience!

Please leave a rating on our LDJAM page!

Like our style? Check out WAVER: A Typing Adventure on Steam!

A Buried Things game.
